data <- read.csv("data/activity.csv")

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
steps_per_day <- na.omit(aggregate(data$steps, list(data$date), sum))
names(steps_per_day) <- c("Date", "Steps")

mean_per_day <- na.omit(aggregate(data$steps, list(data$date), mean))
names(mean_per_day) <- c("Date", "Steps")

median_per_day <- na.omit(aggregate(data$steps, list(data$date), median))
names(median_per_day) <- c("Date", "Steps")
